content.query:
CREATE TABLE PoolActivityLog
(
    [Correlationid] VARCHAR(200),
    [Operationname] VARCHAR(300),
    [Status] VARCHAR(100),
    [Eventcategory] VARCHAR(100),
    [Level] VARCHAR(100),
    [Time] VARCHAR(100),
    [Subscription] VARCHAR(200),
    [Eveninitiatedby] VARCHAR(1000),
    [Resourcetype] VARCHAR(300),
    [Resourcegroup] VARCHAR(1000),
    [Resource] VARCHAR(2000)
)
WITH 
(
    DISTRIBUTION=ROUND_ROBIN
)

COPY INTO PoolActivityLog
FROM 'https://datalake4synapse.blob.core.windows.net/data/ActivityLog-01.parquet'
WITH(
    FILE_TYPE='PARQUET',
    CREDENTIAL=
    (
        IDENTITY='Shared Access Signature',
        SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rlx&se=2024-07-26T21:41:21Z&st=2024-07-04T13:41:21Z&spr=https&sig=0PL4Qm%2BTbWnmVD1sOXpnObi%2FBK7OqBeMNBANy3TZDLQ%3D'
    )
)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PoolActivityLog
